weaponType1.name: Ground Assault
weaponType1.description: These vehicles are used for planetary ground assaults.

weaponType2.name: Air Assault
weaponType2.description: These vehicles are used in space and atmospheric combat.

weaponType3.name: Turbolaser
weaponType3.description: Laser turrets that can be used for ship to ship combat or planetary bombardments.

weaponType4.name: Ion Cannon
weaponType4.description: Ion cannons fire ionized particles capable of disrupting electronic systems

weaponType5.name: Tractor Beam
weaponType5.description: These projectors capture and/or divert space ships.
